subject: PE Today: No More Obama Comments
body:
CBSNews.com












CBSNews.com 
      Turns Off Comments on Obama StoriesToday CBSNews.com 
      informed its staff via email that they should no longer enable comments on 
      stories about presidential candidate Barack Obama. The reason for the new 
      policy, according to the email, is that stories about Obama have been 
      attracting too many racist comments. [+ Read More]
